The Full Stack
Essays About

Chris O'Hara

Marketing executive, author, and recovering advertising person

I've spent 20+ years building marketing organizations, launching products, and trying to make sense of how technology reshapes how we reach people. Currently, I'm VP of Global Product Marketing at SAP, leading go-to-market for AI, analytics, and planning solutions.

Before SAP, I spent five years at Salesforce where I led product marketing for Data Cloud, Tableau, and Marketing Cloud — building a team that generated $2.3B in pipeline. Before the enterprise world, I was deep in ad tech and media, holding leadership roles at Krux Digital (acquired by Salesforce), Digital Trends, and various agency-side positions.

The Full Stack is where I write about the things I'm thinking about — marketing, AI, data strategy, and the occasional detour into whatever's interesting. It's less polished than my LinkedIn posts, more honest than my conference talks.

I also write The Future of PMM, a newsletter specifically about how AI is transforming product marketing.

Books

  • Customer Data Platforms (Wiley, 2020) — #1 Amazon Best Seller in Marketing
  • Data Driven (McGraw Hill, 2018) — Axiom Business Book Award Silver Medal

Career

  • VP Product Marketing, SAP — AI, Analytics & Planning
  • Sr. Director Product Marketing, Salesforce — Data Cloud & Tableau
  • Head of Data & AI Solutions Marketing, Salesforce
  • SVP Marketing, Krux Digital (acquired by Salesforce)
  • 100+ keynotes and speaking engagements worldwide

Expertise
